summary: An ordinance providing for the purchase of certain tide lands adjoining Alki Avenue with a view to the construction of a Marine Boulevard, as contemplated by Ordinance No. 53688, approved September 7, 1927, as amended by Ordinance No. 54964, approved April 3, 1928, as amended by Ordinance No. 55371, approved June 4, 1928, providing for the payment and appropriating money from the Seattle General Municipal Improvement Bonds 1927 Construction Fund therefor.
